outcome: Directorate initiates martial law, clamping down on protests, heightening civilian unrest.

events.description: Council publicly endorses Directorate's call for martial law, effective immediately.
City-wide curfew enforced by military units, resulting in large-scale detentions.
Localized clashes occur between troops and activists in hotspots, increasing casualties.
Reports of rights abuses during curfew operations spark international condemnation.
